entry.data:
SUNNY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 70S
WEST WINDS AROUND 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 70
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 70
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
HIGHS AROUND 70
